item.description:
The details of the Warrior Dash have changed, and the event has now moved from Willington to Thompson CT, and is at the site of the previous Warrior Dash. With nearly 12k taking part you will see everyone from the hardline competitor to those wearing a wedding dress at the event. It is now a 2 day event taking place on the 22nd and 23rd, and I signed up for the 3 p.m. slot on the 22nd. The event for the 22nd is now full.The Warrior Dash is a 5k race with 12 very doable obstacles, but that Warrior wall is still 15ft high!When you click on the below link you can find a video that can let you know what it is all about.

        I am organizing this event along with the Providence Collective, which is a group that some of you might already be members of.We do have a small group of people that have signed up with that group.

        For more information, including registration for  the event go to www.warriordash.com, then click on locations. I will post more details on this event as it gets closer.
item.name: The MUD Run
